data.title: Bitcoin surges, and Vanguard allows trading of some crypto ETFs: CNBC Crypto World
data.description: On today's episode of CNBC Crypto World, bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies surge in a digital asset rebound. Plus, Vanguard and Bank of America update their guidance on crypto for clients. And Zach Pandl, head of research for Grayscale, discusses the company's new chainlink ETF.
